translations: n.（船舶或飞机的）右舷，右侧

sentences.sentence: I could see the fishing boat to starboard.
sentences.translation: 我能看见右侧的那艘渔船。

sentences.sentence: The hull had suffered extensive damage to the starboard side.
sentences.translation: 船体右舷遭到大面积损坏。

sentences.sentence: Because of the way the ship sank, nearly all of the starboard half survived intact.
sentences.translation: 由于船下沉的方式，其一半的右舷几乎都完好无损地保存了下来。
